item.title: [COLOR lime]•[/COLOR] [COLOR cyan][B]Cloud Baby m3uListe[/B] [/COLOR][COLOR red][I] Scraper[/I][/COLOR]

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import cache,client,workers import re,urllib,xbmc,xbmcgui page = client.request('http://www.m3uliste.pw/') express = re.findall('>(http://.+?(.+?)&.+?)<', page) return express

regex.name: makelist2

item.title: [COLOR lime]•[/COLOR] [COLOR cyan][B]Cloud Baby TV Online[/B] [/COLOR][COLOR red][I] Streams[/I][/COLOR]

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re, urllib, base64, xbmcgui, json u = client.request('https://www.tvonlinestreams.com/') u += client.request('https://www.tvonlinestreams.com/page/2/') u += client.request('https://www.tvonlinestreams.com/page/3/') e = re.findall('(?s)entry-title"><a\shref="([^"]*).+?">([^<]*).+?(.+?)pubdate">([^<]*)', u) e = [(i[0],i[1],i[2],i[3]) for i in e if 'EXTINF' in i[2]] e = [(i[0],i[1],i[3]) for i in e] return e

regex.name: Cypher
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re, urllib, base64, xbmcgui, json u = client.request('[makelist.param1]') e = re.findall('#EXTINF:.+?,([^<]*).+?\n([^<]*)', u) return e
